description:
Love at first sightâ€”a ridiculous concept or a true rush of feelings? Onodera realizes his feelings for his senpai, Takano, and must deal with the mixed emotions and confusion that comes with it. Is this just a one-sided love or something more?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Quarrel of Lovers is the Renewal of Love.
